casebody.data:
No. 09-10892. Arthur Simpson, Petitioner v. Patricia L. Caruso, Director, Michigan Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 855, 131 S. Ct. 117,

178 L. Ed. 2d 72,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 6083. October 4, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Sixth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 355 Fed. Appx. 927.
